required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Usefulness of Self-expandable Metal Stents(SEMS) for Malignant Gastric Outlet Obstruction: a Prospective Study Using New Designed Stents
clinical_study.official_title: The Usefulness of Self-expandable Metal Stents(SEMS) for Malignant Gastric Outlet Obstruction: a Prospective Study Using New Designed Stents

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate usefulness of new designed winged stent(SEMS).

primary_outcome.measure: Complication rate(stent migration and tumor ingrowth) of new designed winged stent
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 16 weeks from stent insertion
primary_outcome.description: It will be assessed by a composite measure consisting of physical exam, ECOG PS, GOOSS and gastrointestinal imaging.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the technical success rate of SEMS insertion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 16 weeks from stent insertion
secondary_outcome.description: It will be assessed by a composite measure consisting of physical exam, ECOG PS, GOOSS and gastrointestinal imaging.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the clinical success rate of SEMS insertion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 16 weeks from stent insertion
secondary_outcome.description: It will be assessed by a composite measure consisting of physical exam, ECOG PS, GOOSS and gastrointestinal imaging.

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference of insertion time between previous stent insertion and new designed stent

arm_group.description: participants who are assigned to winged-stent group will be treated with deployment of a winged stent(partially covered or uncovered SEMS).

intervention.description: A winged stent is a newly designed self-expandable metal stents(SEMS). Partially covered, or uncovered winged stent will be placed via the endoscopic intervention for malignant gastric outlet obstruction.

A winged stent is a newly designed self-expandable metal stents(SEMS). Partially covered, or uncovered winged stent will be placed via the endoscopic intervention for malignant gastric outlet obstruction.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Gastric outlet obstruction symptom
2. Diagnosis of gastric outlet obstruction by radiologist or endoscopist
3. Gastric outlet obstruction by malignant disease
4. Aged over 19
5. Informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Gastric outlet obstruction by benign disease or infectious disease
2. Could not endoscopic intervention by poor general condition
3. Refusal of patient
